Posts.Content: Hello My Sisters in this fight: I have a pre-consultantion with the surgeons on Dec 31st. I probably will have a hysterectomy soon there after. In part Im really excited about getting this done. But however I am really concerned for my husband he has been so supportive to me through this whole thing but he needs support to. kieep us both i nyour prayers as we head to this new adventure and another new year. hugs kelly
Posts.Title: In need of Prayers

Posts.Content: TO ALL OF MY SISTERS IN THIS FIGHT: WE ARE MOVING INTO OUR NEW PLACE TOMORROW 07/25 WE ARE SO EXCITED. THINGS ARE GETTING SO CRAZY. ALL MY SISTERS IN THE CALIFORNIA PLEASE E MAIL ME ON CKELLY6371@AOL.COM AND LET ME KNOW SO WE CAN GET TOGETHER. HANG IN THERE AND KEEP FIGHTING AND KNOW MY THOUGHTS WORDS PRAYERS AND HUGS ARE ALWAYS WITH YOU. HUGS KELLY
